TopicTitle: LLL - Lack Luster Labs - Development Thread

Articles.Content:
Oh wow I remember watching these, especially catch the pigeon!

Yeah, I remember it being called Catch the Pigeon, but I googled it and all I found was 'Stop the Pigeon'. Was wondering if I'd just completely mis-remembered that.

Yeah, I remember it being called Catch the Pigeon, but I googled it and all I found was 'Stop the Pigeon'. Was wondering if I'd just completely mis-remembered that.

Show's name was "Stop the Pigeon" but the opening song was "Catch the Pigeon! Catch the Pigeon! Whack him! Smack him..." and I can't remember the rest...

Hey, Lack, a request:

Can we have some fully cylindrical stockalike extendible activity modules in 1.25 and 2.5m half and full length versions. The current one is one of my favorite parts, but it'd be nice to have a few more choices that match stock. Thanks!

Added:
Open structural part (so you can a 6-way port inside)

http://i.imgur.com/yFgJFcT.png

Sweet, even better than I imagined it.

Hey, Lack, a request:

Can we have some fully cylindrical stockalike extendible activity modules in 1.25 and 2.5m half and full length versions. The current one is one of my favorite parts, but it'd be nice to have a few more choices that match stock. Thanks!

You mean like PorkJet's expandable/inflatable habs?

You mean like PorkJet's expandable/inflatable habs?

I'm aware of PorkJet's stuff, but I prefer Lack's modules. They are a great deal smaller and less bulky for one thing.

Lack I have a suggestion...

since you have been working on SXT can you make a deployable ramp using the same module used for landing gear like you did with the RCS booms so that some of us won't have to rely MSI for making deployable ramps

just a suggestion but is should be simple but effective

Yeah, I remember it being called Catch the Pigeon, but I googled it and all I found was 'Stop the Pigeon'. Was wondering if I'd just completely mis-remembered that.

Oh wow, really?

All I remember was the opening song like BananaDealer!

(and clunk )
Um I just noticed that the Fuel tanks are off on the balance. They are a bit heavy on Liquid Fuel for the amount of Oxidizer they hold.

Um I just noticed that the Fuel tanks are off on the balance. They are a bit heavy on Liquid Fuel for the amount of Oxidizer they hold.

You should probably be more specific. Most of the tanks are perfectly balanced (including all the 3.75m ones and all the inflatable ones). However, there's a couple that are slightly off, such as the 5m Stage 2 Tank (which has a bit too much Oxidizer) and the Small Fuel Tank (which has a bit too little). Any others?

Edited March 19, 2014 by Gaius

You should probably be more specific. Most of the tanks are perfectly balanced (including all the 3.75m ones and all the inflatable ones). However, there's a couple that are slightly off, such as the 5m Stage 2 Tank (which has a bit too much Oxidizer) and the Small Fuel Tank (which has a bit too little). Any others?

The 1m LFO tank is heavy on Fuel (Or low on OX depending on how you look at it)

I'm probably going to need some images of the tanks in question, there's a lot of tanks in LLL and SXT. Also, are we talking small amounts (<= 1 unit)? Because in some cases I've rounded to an integer since the floats looked ugly.

Anyway, to prove I'm not dead or anything.

Edited March 22, 2014 by Lack

Is each octhexagonal solar panel a separate part?

Edited March 23, 2014 by Gristle

Is each octagonal solar panel a separate part?

Yes, they are.

Edited March 22, 2014 by Lack

Ehrmagehrd hexapanels!

Will you also make a folding version of the hexagonal panels? And maybe a gigantor-esque giant hexagonal panel? I'm really excited for those hexagonal panels, by the way. Hexagonal panels!

I. Want. Those. Panels!

They look amazing... Structural capability and solar panel in one....

Now, if only there were some wing-pieces that were solar panels....
I literally check this page every 3 hours to check for LLL updates You left me addicted Lack!

I literally check this page every 3 hours to check for LLL updates You left me addicted Lack!

only 3 hours, i am refreshing the page every hour. Still Keep up the good work Lack! Can't wait to use those solar panels for my new station made with KSOS!

what I'd really love to see are some new 3.75m parts. First thing I did when I saw them was start making landers

and this gargantuan laythe variant

even only bigger landing legs and command pod will suffice
Those octo-panels look nice, Lack. I would certainly welcome them for my Duna rovers...
Can I second KAO's request for manding legs that'll work with 3.75m tanks (and SpaceX grasshopper-style 2.5m rockets)

I can do landing legs without suspension, but the squad's new suspension landing leg module remain a steaming pile of you know what and can die in a fire as far as I'm concerned.

i.e. I can't get the blasted things to work, this has pretty much been my exact reaction every time I've tried to get them to work:

I can do landing legs without suspension, but the squad's new suspension landing leg module remain a steaming pile of you know what and can die in a fire as far as I'm concerned.

i.e. I can't get the blasted things to work, this has pretty much been my exact reaction every time I've tried to get them to work:

http://i.imgur.com/4ao73O6.gif

i leave for two days and already lack has made something insane.... also something reallly cool great work but i fear you'll run out of things to model/ work on :/

i leave for two days and already lack has made something insane.... also something reallly cool great work but i fear you'll run out of things to model/ work on :/

Oh I shouldn't worry about that just yet.

hex-structural-panels! Cool!

Just a lil' tip, you should do a 10 minute work on the panel's texture (both solar and structural), it doesn't look very good... (good job nonetheless )

I assume those are magnetometers?

EDIT: YAY #1600 post! No? ok...
